Class dominoes.CantPlayException 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.lang.Throwable
           |
           +----java.lang.Exception
                   |
                   +----dominoes.CantPlayException
public class CantPlayException
extends Exception
This class represents an error while trying to play a bone on the table. It is a simple extension of the java.lang.Exception class.

CantPlayException()
Create an exception with no message
CantPlayException(String)
Create the exception with an error message

CantPlayException 
  public CantPlayException()
Create an exception with no message
CantPlayException 
  public CantPlayException(String message)
Create the exception with an error message
Parameters:
message - the error message for the exception
